00037     typedef unsigned int vertex_descriptor;
00038     typedef std::pair<vertex_descriptor, vertex_descriptor>
00039     edge_descriptor;

00041     typedef std::set<vertex_descriptor>::iterator adjacency_iterator;

00044     typedef std::size_t edges_size_type;

00048     // ---------
00049     // viterator
00050     // ---------
00051 
00057     class vertex_iterator {
00058     private:
00059       vertex_descriptor pos;
00060     public:
00061       vertex_iterator(vertex_descriptor pos) {
00062         this->pos = pos;
00063       }
00064 
00065       vertex_iterator operator ++ () {
00066         ++pos;
00067         return *this;
00068       }
00069 
00070       vertex_iterator operator ++ (int) {
00071         vertex_iterator tmp(*this);
00072         pos++;
00073         return tmp;
00074       }
00075 
00076       vertex_descriptor operator * () {
00077         return pos;
00078       }
00079 
00080       bool operator != (const vertex_iterator& rhs) {
00081         return pos != rhs.pos;
00082       }
00083     };
00084 
00085     /*
00086      *a helper struct to call the edge_iterator constructor for beginning and the end
00087      */
00088 
00089     struct end_tag {};
00090     struct start_tag {};
00091 
00092     /*
00093      *inner class to iterate through all the edges inside the graph class
00094      *
00095      */
00096 
00097     class edge_iterator {
00098     private:
00099       const Graph* thegraph;
00100       vertex_iterator vpos;
00101       std::set<vertex_descriptor>::iterator epos;
00102       std::set<vertex_descriptor> empty_set; // if the graph is empty 
00103       // we need a dummy empty set
00104     public:
00105      //constructor for begin() of all the edges
00106       edge_iterator(const Graph* g, start_tag) : thegraph(g), vpos(vertex_iterator(0)) {
00107         if(!( thegraph->g.empty()) ) epos = thegraph->g[*vpos].begin();
00108         else epos = empty_set.begin();
00109       }
00110      //constructor for end() of all the edges
00111       edge_iterator(const Graph* g, end_tag) : thegraph(g),
00112                                                vpos(vertex_iterator(thegraph->g.size() - 1)) {     
00113         if(!( thegraph->g.empty()) ) epos = thegraph->g[*vpos].end();
00114         else epos = empty_set.end();
00115       }
00116       edge_iterator operator ++ () {
00117         if(epos == thegraph->g[*vpos].end()) {
00118           vpos++;
00119           epos = thegraph->g[*vpos].begin();
00120         }
00121         else {
00122           epos++;
00123         }
00124         return *this;
00125       }
00126 
00127       edge_iterator operator ++ (int) {
00128         edge_iterator tmp = *this;
00129         ++(*this);
00130         return tmp;
00131       }
00132 
00133       edge_descriptor operator * () {
00134         return edge_descriptor(*vpos, *epos);
00135       }
00136 
00137       bool operator != (const edge_iterator& rhs) {
00138         if(this == &rhs)
00139           return false;
00140         else
00141           return epos != rhs.epos || vpos != rhs.vpos ||
00142             thegraph != rhs.thegraph;
00143       }
00144     }; // end edge iterator
00145

00158     friend std::pair<edge_descriptor, bool>
00159     add_edge (vertex_descriptor x, vertex_descriptor y, Graph& myG) {
00160       bool            b = myG.g[x].insert(y).second;
00161       edge_descriptor ed(x,y);// = std::make_pair(a,b);
00162       return std::make_pair(ed, b);
00163     }
00164 
00165     // ----------
00166     // add_vertex
00167     // ----------
00168         
00175     friend vertex_descriptor
00176     add_vertex (Graph& myG) {
00177       myG.g.push_back( std::set<vertex_descriptor>() );
00178       return myG.ind++;
00179     }
00180         
00181     // -----------------
00182     // adjacent_vertices
00183     // -----------------
00184         
00193     friend std::pair<adjacency_iterator, adjacency_iterator>
00194     adjacent_vertices (vertex_descriptor x, const Graph& myG) {
00195       adjacency_iterator b = myG.g[x].begin();
00196       adjacency_iterator e = myG.g[x].end();
00197       return std::make_pair(b, e);
00198     }
00199 
00200     // ----
00201     // edge
00202     // ----
00203         
00209     friend std::pair<edge_descriptor, bool>
00210     edge (vertex_descriptor x, vertex_descriptor y, const Graph& myG) {
00211       assert(x < (myG.ind - 1));
00212       bool            b = myG.g[x].count(y);
00213       edge_descriptor ed(x, y);
00214       return std::make_pair(ed, b);
00215     }
00216 
00217     // -----
00218     // edges
00219     // -----
00220         
00226     friend std::pair<edge_iterator, edge_iterator>
00227     edges (const Graph& mygraph) {
00228       edge_iterator b(&mygraph, start_tag());
00229       edge_iterator e(&mygraph, end_tag());
00230       return std::make_pair(b, e);
00231     }

00234     // vertex
00235     // ------
00236         
00243     friend vertex_descriptor
00244     vertex (vertices_size_type n, const Graph& myG) {
00245       assert(n < (myG.ind - 1));
00246       return static_cast<vertex_descriptor>(n);
00247     }
00248 
00249     // --------
00250     // vertices
00251     // --------
00252         
00259     friend std::pair<vertex_iterator, vertex_iterator>
00260     vertices (const Graph& mygraph) {
00261       vertex_iterator b(0);
00262       vertex_iterator e(mygraph.g.size() - 1);
00263       return std::make_pair(b, e);
00264     }

00266     // ------
00267     // source
00268     // ------
00269         
00275     friend vertex_descriptor
00276     source (edge_descriptor x, const Graph& myG) {
00277       assert(x.first < myG.g.size() );
00278       return x.first;
00279     }

00297     // ---------
00298         
00304     friend edges_size_type
00305     num_edges (const Graph& myG) {
00306       edges_size_type num;
00307       for(unsigned int i=0; i< myG.g.size(); ++i) {
00308         num += myG.g[i].size();
00309       }
00310       return num;
00311     }

00322     friend vertices_size_type
00323     num_vertices (const Graph& myG) {
00324       return  static_cast<vertices_size_type>(myG.g.size());
00325     }

00343     bool valid () const {
00344       return ind == g.size();
